meaning.en: The quality of being humane; benevolence.
meaning.vi: Sự hiện diện hoặc lập trường có chủ đích dễ thấy, được công khai rộng rãi.

meaning.en: the humanities  languages and literature, esp. those of the classical Greeks and Romans the branches of learning concerned with human thought and relations, as distinguished from the sciences: literature, philosophy, history, etc.
